attributes.action: re-appoint Professor David Nutt as the chair of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs. We believe that government should support the independence of the Advisory Council and are appalled by the present government’s disregard for  evidence-based policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
